entry.title: how to configure java spring hadoop framework to run on amazon emr
entry.content:
Start emr instance bash start emr instance command elastic-mapreduce -c ./cfg/credentials.json --create --name ad-hoc-cluster --instance-group master --instance-type m1.small --instance-count 1 --instance-group core --instance-type m1.small --instance-count 2 --instance-group task --instance-type m1.small --instance-count 3 --bid-price .065 --alive

Open ssh tunneling bash open ssh tunneling command elastic-mapreduce -j $JOB_ID --socks

Create a project
